LanguageData.WNA_Medikit.label: WNA military medikit
LanguageData.WNA_Medikit.description: Medicines and tools packed together in WNA standard, processed from various possible materials. The process has gone through many improvements, thus minimum efforts can lead to maximum effects. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Ration.label: WNA military ration
LanguageData.WNA_Ration.description: Standard ration pack for Whelingnorther Alliance (especially for Whelingnorther Humanoid Revolt). Produced from highest quality materials - theoretically. Anything that contains nutrients can be used to make this ration if needed. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
